mapper.select:
select seri.*,seridx.sdx from ${company}_serviceitem seri left join ${company}_serviceitemsort seridx on seri.`id`=seridx.`sid` where seri.`enabled`= 1
and seri.name like concat('%',#{keywords},'%')
order by seridx.sdx

select seri.*,seridx.sdx from ${company}_serviceitem seri left join ${company}_serviceitemsort seridx on seri.`id`=seridx.`sid`
where seri.name like concat('%',#{keywords},'%')
order by seridx.sdx
mapper.insert:
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ${company}_pricetype (id, sid, sname, tpname, price) values (#{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.tpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.price,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

select LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ${company}_serviceitem (id, timelong, priveType, price, overtime, clocknum, dSalaryLz, dSalaryDz, dSalaryDp, dSalarySz, needpoint, name, mark, enabled, isdiscount, timepermit, pointChange, sp1, sp2, sp3) values (#{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.timelong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.priveType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{record.overtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.clocknum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.dSalaryLz,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{record.dSalaryDz,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{record.dSalaryDp,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{record.dSalarySz,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{record.needpoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.isdiscount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.timepermit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.pointChange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.sp1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.sp2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.sp3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update ${company}_serviceitem
timelong = #{record.timelong,jdbcType=INTEGER},
priveType = #{record.priveType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{record.price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
overtime = #{record.overtime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
clocknum = #{record.clocknum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dSalaryLz = #{record.dSalaryLz,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dSalaryDz = #{record.dSalaryDz,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dSalaryDp = #{record.dSalaryDp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dSalarySz = #{record.dSalarySz,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
needpoint = #{record.needpoint,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mark = #{record.mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enabled = #{record.enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isdiscount = #{record.isdiscount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
timepermit = #{record.timepermit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pointChange = #{record.pointChange,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sp1 = #{record.sp1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sp2 = #{record.sp2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sp3 = #{record.sp3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ${company}_serviceitem set timelong = #{record.timelong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, priveType = #{record.priveType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{record.price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, overtime = #{record.overtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, clocknum = #{record.clocknum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dSalaryLz = #{record.dSalaryLz,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, dSalaryDz = #{record.dSalaryDz,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, dSalaryDp = #{record.dSalaryDp,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, dSalarySz = #{record.dSalarySz,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, needpoint = #{record.needpoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mark = #{record.mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{record.enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isdiscount = #{record.isdiscount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, timepermit = #{record.timepermit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pointChange = #{record.pointChange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sp1 = #{record.sp1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sp2 = #{record.sp2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sp3 = #{record.sp3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
